name: Project: Blue (NeoOutPut, KuroBlood, BlackStormXD, YaguraDono)
description:
Project: Blue (NeoOutPut, KuroBlood, BlackStormXD, YaguraDono) is a game developed by NeoOutPut, KuroBlood and BlackStormXD. It was originally released in 2020.
Project: Blue (NeoOutPut, KuroBlood, BlackStormXD, YaguraDono) is available on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
